General.Name: Carebook Technologies Inc
General.Description: Carebook Technologies Inc. engages in the development and commercialization of digital health platforms worldwide. The company offers Corehealth, a wellness platform for employers, and wellness and service providers; Wellness Checkpoint platform that offers health and productivity risk management; and Carebook, a turn-key, modular, and pharmacy engagement platform. Carebook Technologies Inc. is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1400-2045 Stanley Street, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3A 2V4
